Body:
tss_dict = {'seq_id': 'aaa', 'source': 'Refseq', 'feature': 'TSS', 'start':
    3, 'end': 3, 'phase': '.', 'strand': '+', 'score': '.'}
attributes_tss = {'ID': 'TSS0', 'Name': 'TSS_0', 'type': 'Primary,Internal',
    'associated_gene': 'AAA_00001,AAA_00004', 'UTR_length':
    'Primary_25,Internal_NA'}
tss = Create_generator(tss_dict, attributes_tss, 'gff')
output = mm.compare_tss_gene(tss, self.example.genes)
self.assertEqual(output[0],
    'utr_length=Primary_3;associated_gene=AAA_00001;type=Primary;Name=TSS_3+')
self.assertDictEqual(output[1], {'Name': 'TSS_3+', 'utr_length':
    'Primary_3', 'type': 'Primary', 'associated_gene': 'AAA_00001'})
